entry.title: Our work on imaging the phonon dynamics in nanostructures has been published on Nature!

link.title: Our work on imaging the phonon dynamics in nanostructures has been published on Nature!

entry.content: After almost two years of collaborative work, our work has finally been published on Nature! I am glad to contribute to this work as a theorist and clarify the microscopic physical picture in the vibrational EELS experiment. Also, see this nice news piece for a clear explanation.
entry.summary: After almost two years of collaborative work, our work has finally been published on Nature! I am glad to contribute to this work as a theorist and clarify the microscopic physical picture in the vibrational EELS experiment. Also, see this nice news piece for a clear explanation.
